workflow.name: NPR listening service MCP server
workflow.description:
Complete MCP server exposing 9 NPR Listening Service API operations to AI agents.

## ‚ö° Quick Setup
Need help? Want access to more workflows and even live Q&A sessions with a top verified n8n creator.. All 100% free?

[Join the community](https://www.skool.com/n8n-nodes-automation-lab-1570/about)
1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Credentials** Add NPR Listening Service credentials
3. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
4. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
5. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

## üîß How it Works

This workflow converts the NPR Listening Service API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://listening.api.npr.org
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent

## üìã Available Operations (9 total)

### üîß V2 (9 endpoints)

‚Ä¢ **GET /v2/aggregation/{aggId}/recommendations**: Get a set of recommendations for an aggregation independent of the user's lis...
‚Ä¢ **GET /v2/channels**: List Available Channels
‚Ä¢ **GET /v2/history**: Get User Ratings History
‚Ä¢ **GET /v2/organizations/{orgId}/categories/{category}/recommendations**: Get a list of recommendations from a category of content from an organization
‚Ä¢ **GET /v2/organizations/{orgId}/recommendations**: Get a variety of details about an organization including various lists of rec...
‚Ä¢ **GET /v2/promo/recommendations**: Get Recent Promo Audio
‚Ä¢ **POST /v2/ratings**: Submit Media Ratings
‚Ä¢ **GET /v2/recommendations**: Get User Recommendations
‚Ä¢ **GET /v2/search/recommendations**: Get Search Recommendations

## ü§ñ AI Integration

**Parameter Handling**: AI agents automatically provide values for:
‚Ä¢ Path parameters and identifiers
‚Ä¢ Query parameters and filters
‚Ä¢ Request body data
‚Ä¢ Headers and authentication

**Response Format**: Native NPR Listening Service API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n HTTP request error management

## üí° Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

‚Ä¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Cursor**: Add MCP server SSE URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
‚Ä¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints

## ‚ú® Benefits

‚Ä¢ **Zero Setup**: No parameter mapping or configuration needed
‚Ä¢ **AI-Ready**: Built-in `$fromAI()` expressions for all parameters
‚Ä¢ **Production Ready**: Native n8n HTTP request handling and logging
‚Ä¢ **Extensible**: Easily modify or add custom logic

> üÜì **[Free for community use](https://github.com/Cfomodz/community-use)!** Ready to deploy in under 2 minutes.

parameters.content:
### ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

1. **Import Workflow**: 
Load this workflow into your n8n instance

2. **Configure Authentication**: 
Set up oauth2 credentials

3. **Activate Workflow**:
Enable the workflow to start the MCP server

4. **Get MCP URL**: 
Copy the webhook URL from the MCP trigger

5. **Connect AI Agent**:
Use the MCP URL in your AI agent configuration


### üí° Usage Notes
‚Ä¢ Parameters are auto-populated by AI using $fromAI() expressions
‚Ä¢ With 9 API endpoints available as tools
‚Ä¢ Responses maintain original API structure


### üõ†Ô∏è Customization
‚Ä¢ Add data transformation nodes if needed
‚Ä¢ Implement custom error handling
‚Ä¢ Add logging or monitoring nodes

‚Ä¢ Modify parameter defaults in any HTTP request node as needed

### üí¨ Need Help?
Ping me on [discord](https://discord.me/cfomodz) for integration guidance and custom automations. Check the [n8n documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.toolmcp/) for more information.

## üõ†Ô∏è NPR Listening Service MCP Server ‚úÖ 9 operations

### About
Audio recommendations tailored to a user's preferences

### üîß How it Works

This workflow converts the NPR Listening Service API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://listening.api.npr.org
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent


### üìã Available Operations (9 endpoints)

**Aggregation (1 operations)**
Get Aggregation Recommendations

**Channels (1 operations)**
List Available Channels

**History (1 operations)**
Get User Ratings History

**Organizations (2 operations)**
Get Category Recommendations, Get Organization Details

**Promo (1 operations)**
Get Recent Promo Audio

**Ratings (1 operations)**
Submit Media Ratings

**Recommendations (1 operations)**
Get User Recommendations

**Search (1 operations)**
Get Search Recommendations

parameters.url: =https://listening.api.npr.org/v2/aggregation/{{ $fromAI('aggId', 'ID of an aggregation such as a program or podcast. If the specified ID is a program that publishes rundowns, the latest rundown will be returned.', 'number') }}/recommendations

parameters.name: startNum
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('startNum', 'The result to start with. Allows paging through the episodes of a podcast or program, with the default, `startNum=0`, being the most recent episode. Ignored for programs that publish a rundown.', 'number', 0) }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Get a set of recommendations for an aggregation independent of the user's listening history

Parameters:
- Path parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ aggId (required) - ID of an aggregation such as a program or podcast. If the specified ID is a program that publishes rundowns, the latest rundown will be returned.
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ startNum (optional) - Result to start with. Allows paging through the episodes of a podcast or program, with the default, `startNum=0`, being the most recent episode. Ignored for programs that publish a rundown.

parameters.name: exploreOnly
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('exploreOnly', 'If set to `true`, this call will return only channels that should be shown in the client's `Explore` view', 'boolean', false) }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Get the list of available channels

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ exploreOnly (optional) - If set to `true`, this call will return only channels that should be shown in the client's `Explore` view
Get recent ratings the logged-in user has submitted

parameters.url: =https://listening.api.npr.org/v2/organizations/{{ $fromAI('orgId', 'ID of an organization, such as an NPR One station', 'number') }}/categories/{{ $fromAI('category', 'One of the three categories of content - newscast, story, or podcast', 'string', 'story') }}/recommendations
parameters.toolDescription:
Get a list of recommendations from a category of content from an organization

Parameters:
- Path parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ orgId (required) - ID of an organization, such as an NPR One station
  ‚Ä¢ category (required) - One of the three categories of content - newscast, story, or podcast

parameters.url: =https://listening.api.npr.org/v2/organizations/{{ $fromAI('orgId', 'ID of an organization, such as an NPR One station', 'number') }}/recommendations
parameters.toolDescription:
Get a variety of details about an organization including various lists of recent audio items

Parameters:
- Path parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ orgId (required) - ID of an organization, such as an NPR One station
Retrieve the most recent promo audio heard by the logged-in user

parameters.name: recommend
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('recommend', 'If set to `false`, this call will return a blank document; otherwise it will return a new recommendation object', 'boolean', true) }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Collect new ratings for media previously recommended to the logged-in user

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ recommend (optional) - If set to `false`, this call will return a blank document; otherwise it will return a new recommendation object

parameters.name: sharedMediaId
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('sharedMediaId', 'This media was shared directly with the user; if provided, the service will add this recommendation to the top of the list', 'string') }}

parameters.name: notifiedMediaId
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('notifiedMediaId', 'The user received a push notification about this media; if provided, the service will add this recommendation to the top of the list', 'string') }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Get a list of media for the logged-in user from NPR's recommendation engine

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ sharedMediaId (optional) - Media was shared directly with the user; if provided, the service will add this recommendation to the top of the list
  ‚Ä¢ notifiedMediaId (optional) - User received a push notification about this media; if provided, the service will add this recommendation to the top of the list

parameters.name: searchTerms
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('searchTerms', 'Search terms to search on; can include URL-encoded punctuation', 'string') }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Get a list of recent audio and aggregation items associated with search terms

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ searchTerms (required) - Search terms to search on; can include URL-encoded punctuation
